alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Kenedy, northeastern Hidalgo, northern Cameron and Willacy Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Mansfield to 8 miles northwest of Yturria to 7 miles northeast of La Reforma. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Harlingen, San Benito, Raymondville, La Feria, Elsa, Edcouch, Santa Rosa, Lyford, and Rio Hondo. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 16 and 51. Interstate Highway 69 C between mile markers 6 and 12. US Highway 77 between mile markers 752 and 762. US Highway 281 between mile markers 746 and 764. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
